entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Periods of drizzle early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
